title: Casey S. (Verified ZocDoc User)'s Review of Dr. Rowell Ashford - MD (5/5) on ZocDoc
text: OB-GYN Professional Statement Dr. Rowell Ashford is a caring and reputable obstetrician and gynecologist caring for the Birmingham, AL community. Dr. Ashford attended the University of California, San Francisco, where he earned his degree in medicine. He completed his residency in obstetrics and gynecology from the University of Alabama. Dr. Ashford is a part of Baptist Health Centers - Princeton OB/GYN and is board certified by the American Board of Obstetrics and Gynecology. Dr. Ashford is devoted to ensuring the longevity of his patientsâ€™ health and developing long-lasting relationships with them. He takes his time to understand symptoms and give correct diagnoses to ensure the continued health of all his patients. Zocdoc Awards
